metadata.synopsis: One liner for a client in Sorcerous Sundries, asking where the manager is.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to S_LOW_Client_005  in Sorcerous Sundries (CTY_Main_A -15; 26; -81)

0.speaker: Hector Roba
0.text: I'm not moving from this spot until Lorroakan comes and speaks to me personally. I will be heard!

1.speaker: Hector Roba
1.text: Where is the famous Lorroakan? His shop is an utter shambles!
